    Publications

    • Lightweight and Breach-Resilient Authenticated Encryption Framework for Internet of Things

      Saif E. Nouma, Attila A. Yavuz, "Lightweight and Breach-Resilient Authenticated Encryption Framework for Internet of Things", IEEE Military Communications (MILCOM), Oct 2025, Los Angeles, CA, USA.

    • LiteQSign: Lightweight and Quantum-Safe Signatures for Heterogeneous IoT Applications

      Attila A. Yavuz, Saleh Darzi, Saif E. Nouma, "LiteQSign: Lightweight and Quantum-Safe Signatures for Heterogeneous IoT Applications", IEEE Access , 2025

    • Additively Manufactured RF Electronics With Structurally Integrated Physically Unclonable Functions for Wireless System Security

      Aaron Pendino, Nghia Nguyen, Saif E. Nouma, Jing Wang, Attila A. Yavuz, Yasin Yilmaz, and Gokhan Mumcu, "Additively Manufactured RF Electronics With Structurally Integrated Physically Unclonable Functions for Wireless System Security.", IEEE Access , 2025

    • Signer-Optimal Multiple-Time PostQuantum Hash-Based Signature for Heterogeneous IoT Systems

      Kiarash Sedghighadikolaei, Attila A. Yavuz, Saif E. Nouma, "Signer-Optimal Multiple-Time PostQuantum Hash-Based Signature for Heterogeneous IoT Systems", Internet of Things, September 2025.

    • Lightweight and High-Throughput Secure Logging for Internet of Things and Cold Cloud Continuum

      Saif E. Nouma, Attila A. Yavuz, "Lightweight and High-Throughput Secure Logging for Internet of Things and Cold Cloud Continuum", ArXiv preprint arXiv:2506.08781, June 2025. (Minor revision at ACM Transactions on Internet of Things)

    • Post-Quantum Hybrid Digital Signatures with Hardware-Support for Digital Twins

      Saif E. Nouma, Attila A. Yavuz, "Post-Quantum Hybrid Digital Signatures with Hardware-Support for Digital Twins", ACM Transactions on Multimedia Computing, Communications, and Applications (ACM TOMM), Volume 20, Issue 6, pp 1-30, March 2024.

    • Lightweight and Resilient Signatures for Cloud-Assisted Embedded IoT Systems

      Saif E. Nouma, Attila A. Yavuz, "Lightweight and Resilient Signatures for Cloud-Assisted Embedded IoT Systems", arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.13937, March 2024, (Minor revision at Wiley Security and Privacy) .

    • Beyond Basic Trust: Envisioning the Future of NextGen Networked Systems and Digital Signatures

      Attila A. Yavuz, Kiarash Sedghighadikolaei, Saleh Darzi, Saif E. Nouma, ”Beyond Basic Trust: Envisioning the Future of NextGen Networked Systems and Digital Signatures”, 5th IEEE Conference on Trust, Privacy and Security in Intelligent Systems, and Applications (IEEE TPS), May 2023, Atlanta, Georgia, USA.

    • Practical Cryptographic Forensic Tools for Lightweight Internet of Things and Cold Storage Systems

      Saif E. Nouma, Attila A. Yavuz, ”Practical Cryptographic Forensic Tools for Lightweight Internet of Things and Cold Storage Systems”, 8th ACM/IEEE Conference on Internet of Things Design and Implementation (ACM/IEEE IoTDI), May 2023, San Antonio, Texas, USA.

    • Post-Quantum Forward-Secure Signatures with Hardware-Support for Internet of Things

      Saif E. Nouma, Attila A. Yavuz, ”Post-Quantum Forward-Secure Signatures with Hardware-Support for Internet of Things”, IEEE International Conference on Communications (IEEE ICC), May 2023, Rome, Italy

    • Lightweight Digital Signatures for Internet of Things: Current and PostQuantum Trends and Visions

      Saif E. Nouma, Attila A. Yavuz, ”Lightweight Digital Signatures for Internet of Things: Current and PostQuantum Trends and Visions”, 6th IEEE Conference on IEEE Conference on Dependable and Secure Computing (IEEE DSC), May 2023, Tampa, Florida, USA.

    • System and Method for Cryptographic Forensic Audits on Lightweight IoT and Digital Archives

      Attila A. Yavuz and Saif E. Nouma, "System and Method for Cryptographic Forensic Audits on Lightweight IoT and Digital Archives”, US Patent US20240007300A1, Filed: June 2023.

    • Hardware Supported Authentication and Signatures for Wireless, Distributed and Blockchain Systems

      Attila A. Yavuz and Saif E. Nouma, ”Hardware Supported Authentication and Signatures for Wireless, Distributed and Blockchain Systems”, US Patent US20230308289A1, Filed: Mar 2023.

    • Distributed Cyber-infrastructures and Artificial Intelligence in Hybrid Post-Quantum Era

      Attila A. Yavuz, Saif E. Nouma, Thang Hoang, Duncan Earl, Scott Packard, ”Distributed Cyber-infrastructures and Artificial Intelligence in Hybrid Post-Quantum Era”, 4th IEEE International Conference on Trust, Privacy and Security in Intelligent Systems, and Applications (IEEE TPS), December 2022 (virtual).

    • Hybrid Low-Cost Quantum-Safe Key Distribution

      Attila A. Yavuz, Duncan Earl, Scott Packard and Saif E. Nouma, ”Hybrid Low-Cost Quantum-Safe Key Distribution”, Quantum 2.0 - Optica, May 2022, MA, USA.

    • Applications of Machine Learning (ML) in Networking and IoT

      Saif E. Nouma, "Applications of Machine Learning (ML) in Networking and IoT", HAL preprint hal02932494), July 2020.
